name: The Tiny Survivor
description:
The Tiny Survivor is a simple but addictive game!

The goal is very simple, see how far you can go without dying.

[ Features ]

✔ Easy and fun gameplay.
✔ Super lightweight game!
✔ Pixel Art Retro Graphics.
✔ Challenger.
✔ FREE to play

[ How to play ]

- Tap the arrows to the sides to move on the platform.
- Tap the down arrow and destroy the block where the hero is standing.
- Watch out for the spines and monsters scattered on the map.
- Calculate each movement so you do not get stuck.

We hope you enjoy the game.
Have a good time!
